text: Nimen [youtai jiaotu] que you yi zhong jixiang: Liang zhi jundui zaoyu [ru bai de'er zhanyi], yi zhi shi wei an la zhi dao zhandou de [xinshi], ling yi zhi shi bu xinyang zhe, tamen [xinshi] qinyan kanjian diren [bu xinyang zhe de renshu] shi ziji de liang bei. An la yi qi shengli zhichi tasuo yiyu zhe. Dui you yanli de renmen, ci zhong que you yi zhong jianjie.
